data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sidorov, Dmitry, Reddy, Yenumula Ranga, Shaik, Shabuddin (2018): Groundwater amphipods (Crustacea, Malacostraca) of India, with description of three new cavernicolous species. Zootaxa 4508 (3): 403-426, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4508.3.4|4 occurrences
